plot outline: A story of a sweet and innocent girl named Kammal (Keerti Gaekwad Kelkar) who is brought up by three bar dancers Rama (Pratima Kazmi), Shabbo (Zahida Parveen) and Rita (Niyati Joshi). They bring up Kammal with lot of care and affection and keep her away from the harsh truths of life. The story takes a major twist when a rich young boy named Manav (Sandeep Baswana) falls in love with Kammal but his family opposes their relationship on knowing Kammal's background.
title: Kammal
plot: The story portrays the life of a young girl, _Kammal_ (qv) (Keerti Gaekwad Kelkar), who is brought up by three bar dancers.

A story of a sweet and innocent girl named _Kammal_ (qv) (Keerti Gaekwad Kelkar) who is brought up by three bar dancers Rama (Pratima Kazmi), Shabbo (Zahida Parveen) and Rita (Niyati Joshi). They bring up _Kammal_ (qv) with lot of care and affection and keep her away from the harsh truths of life. The story takes a major twist when a rich young boy named Manav (Sandeep Baswana) falls in love with _Kammal_ (qv) but his family opposes their relationship on knowing _Kammal_ (qv)'s background.::Akash
